name: Physics City
description:
• This is currently in early access!
    This Game is inspired on BalanCity!
    Thanks shiba_x (senpai_mxkun) for the assets.
    This Game was made in Construct 3.
  • Current Version is 0.9.0

If you klick "Run Game" please be sure the game runs in fullscreen!

Todo:

Sandbox Mode, Townhall 3, Settings, Even more houses and shops, Minigames (?), Highscore System, better Tutorial

--Tutorial--

To buy houses you need money. You get money by pressing the "Shop Icon" in the upper right corner. When you are done, click on the "House Icon" in the lower left corner to buy houses. At the top left you can see your residents and the money. At the bottom right you can see a star. Click on it to enlarge your construction area and unlock skyscrapers.

Don't Work?

Download the Game manually below.
